title: malzmethods
author: malzmethods
content: UK ONLY 100% Works ! Method & Accounts  - SPEND NECTAR PTS in Argos & SainsburysThis method is working 100% TODAY and for the small number of people that know about it has been running for a few years strong. We are selling the method which will explain exactly how to spend Nectar points in Argos & Sainsbury's stores , We will also able to provide points to spend (additional cost) Spend freely at self-checkout without having to deal with staff members. Tobacco & Alcohol purchases are also good to go. Buy any electronics and household items at a fraction of the actual cost from Argos. This will not be mass sold to prevent saturation. Any mods or high level members can come through and get small value accounts with points ready to spend in return for reviews.Don't sleep on this one. This message will self destruct !FULL METHOD + SUPPORT -  £200 ( any crytpo ,escrow available if done officially through this site)NECTAR ACCOUNTS - £100 for 100 random ( need to be checked,some may have £0 some may have £100's ,approx 60% have spendable balance)READY TO SPEND CODES 70% of face value - These are checked and ready to spend just do your shopping and swipe the code on the machine at the end to pay ! No need for the method with these, just shop & pay !MALZMETHODS
